flask_api module¶

Contains the database schema to allow mapping to the database table.

class flask_api.Booking(PickUpDate, PickUpTime, ReturnDate, ReturnTime, CarID, UserName, BookingID=None)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Model

The database schema for the Booking table.

class flask_api.BookingDetailsSchema(**kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_marshmallow.schema.Schema

Format Booking Detail schema output with marshmallow.

Bases: flask_marshmallow.schema.Schema

Format Booking schema output with marshmallow.

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Model

class flask_api.UserSchema(**kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_marshmallow.schema.Schema

flask_api.addBooking()¶

Add booking into database.

Returns

“message”: “Pick up and return dates cannot be same”/”Cannot enter a date in the past”/”Pick up date has to be before return date”/”Car not available in this slot”/”Success”

Return type

JSON

flask_api.addUser()¶

Add user into the database.

Returns

“message”: “This email is already registered with another account”/”This username is already taken”/”Success”

Return type

JSON

flask_api.cancelBooking(bookingId)¶

Remove booking from database. :param bookingId: Booking’s unique identifier. :type bookingId: str

Returns

Redirects client to “site.bookingsByUser”

flask_api.checkLogin()¶

Retrieve login information from database and verify login details based on username and password.

Returns

“message”: “Invalid username or password”/”Success”

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getAllBookings()¶

Get all bookings from database.

Returns

Booking information (e.g “BookingID”,”PickUpDate”,”PickUpTime”,”ReturnDate”,”ReturnTime”,”CarID”,”UserName”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getBookings(carId)¶

Get all bookings from database.

Parameters

carId (str) – Car unique identifier

Returns

Booking information (e.g “BookingID”,”PickUpDate”,”PickUpTime”,”ReturnDate”,”ReturnTime”,”CarID”,”UserName”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getBookingsByUserId(userId)¶

Get all booking details from database.

Returns

Booking details information (e.g “BookingID”,”PickUpDate”,”PickUpTime”,”ReturnDate”,”ReturnTime”, “UserName”,”CarID”,”Make”,”Type”,”Location”,”Color”,”Seats”,”CostPerHour”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getBookingsByUserIdAndDate(userId)¶

Fetch bookings for a particular user from database where the return date and return time is greater than the current time and todays date.

Parameters

userId (str) – User’s unique identifier.

Returns

Booking details information (e.g “BookingID”,”PickUpDate”,”PickUpTime”,”ReturnDate”,”ReturnTime”,”UserName”, “CarID”,”Make”,”Type”,”Location”,”Color”,”Seats”,”CostPerHour”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getCars()¶

Gets cars information from database.

Returns

Car information (e.g “CarID”, “Make”, “Type”, “Location”, “Color”, “Seats”, “CostPerHour”,”Status”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getFilteredCars(make, seats, price)¶

Retrieve car information from database and filter them based on make/seat/price.

Parameters

  • make (str) – Car make

  • seats (int) – No. of Seats in the car

  • price (str) – Rental price of car

Returns

Car information (e.g “CarID”, “Make”, “Type”, “Location”, “Color”, “Seats”, “CostPerHour”,”Status”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getLogins()¶

Get all login data from database.

Returns

Login information (e.g “LoginID”, “UserName”, “Password”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.getUsers()¶

Retrieve users’ information from database.

Returns

User information (e.g “UserID”, “FirstName”, “LastName”, “UserName”, “Email”, “Role”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.updateCarLocation()¶

Updates car location in the database.

Returns

Car information (e.g “CarID”, “Make”, “Type”, “Location”, “Color”, “Seats”, “CostPerHour”,”Status”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.updateCarStatus()¶

Updates car status in the database.

Returns

Car information (e.g “CarID”, “Make”, “Type”, “Location”, “Color”, “Seats”, “CostPerHour”,”Status”)

Return type

JSON

flask_api.user_exists(username)¶

Check whether input username exists in the database.

Returns

“message”: “True”/”False”

Return type

JSON
